abstract: Man identified as Joseph Caputo scales White House fence as Pres Obama celebrates Thanksgiving with his family; Caputo is immediately apprehended by Secret Service, but incident still highlights ongoing vulnerability of White House grounds.
lead_paragraph: Agents apprehended a man draped in an American flag on the North Lawn on Thursday, moments after he cleared the fence, the Secret Service said.

headline.main: Man Scales White House Fence as Obamas Celebrate Thanksgiving Inside
headline.print_headline: Fence Is Scaled at White House

snippet: Agents apprehended a man draped in an American flag on the North Lawn on Thursday, moments after he cleared the fence, the Secret Service said.
